div.p: This page contains a list with the name and a short description for all the examples, that are defined in this IG. To see a list of all FHIR artifacts defined as part of this IG go to Artifact Index.

li.p: This example contains a Cohort that defines include and exclude characteristics for a ResearchStudy.
This example contains a Cohort that defines include characteristics and a startWith-Operator.
This example contains a Questionnaire that can be used in a ResearchStudy.
This example contains a possible response to the Questionnaire Example - CRF Intervall.
This example contains a Location for the CHU de Liège clinic.
This example contains a Location for the Fondazione Toscana Gabriele Monasterio clinic.
This example shows a ResearchStudy where the enrollment period is already over and show the repräsentation of this in the demo.
This example was created to have no match with the demo patients and show the repräsentation of this in the demo.
This example contains a CRP ResearchStudy.
This example contains a ResearchStudy that was created to request data provided in an example resource from FTGM.

This example contains a ResearchStudy that was created to request data provided in an example resource from FTGM. Furthermore, the example includes a frequency that represent the request for an one-time data transmission.
This bundle contains an example for a ResearchStudy with a function on the DataRequirements.
This bundle contains an example for a ResearchStudy with a related pdf containing a description of the Study.
This example is a ResearchStudy where the other resources, like the Location, are only referenced.
